definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: Pope's is a velvet lawn, shaven by the scythe, and levelled by the roller.
sentences.chinese: 蒲柏的稿纸是天鹅绒般的草坪，镰刀割过，碾辊压过。

sentences.english: No. Candidates may use only their question book for calculations and scratch work.
sentences.chinese: 不行，考生只能使用他们的考卷来做为草稿纸计算。

sentences.english: The forms are on the desk over there.
sentences.chinese: 电报稿纸在那边桌子上。

sentences.english: And a lot of idle resources, such as notebooks, such as draft paper .
sentences.chinese: 而闲置的资源也很多，比如草稿纸笔记本等。

sentences.english: Will put his pile of papers on the table and sat down.
sentences.chinese: 威尔把他那叠稿纸放到桌子上，坐下来。

sentences.english: There's a telegraph form. Please write your telegram in block letters.
sentences.chinese: 给你电报稿纸，请用印刷体书写电报。

sentences.english: I was scratch paper again and again write down the name.
sentences.chinese: 是我在草稿纸上一遍一遍写下的名字。

sentences.english: The paper reappeared again in front of me, but new corrections made me goggle .
sentences.chinese: 稿纸再一次出现在我面前，但新的改动让我傻了眼。

sentences.english: Grab a pen and some scraps of paper and start gathering your ideas.
sentences.chinese: 抓起一支笔和一些草稿纸开始收集你的想法。

sentences.english: Use your test booklet for scratch paper.
sentences.chinese: 使用测试手册当作草稿纸。

sentences.english: Excuse me, can you tell me where I can buy some writing paper?
sentences.chinese: 请问，你能告诉我什么地方能买到稿纸吗？

sentences.english: Would you please buy a pen and some writing paper for me?
sentences.chinese: 请你帮我买一支钢笔和一些稿纸，好吗？

sentences.english: She looked down at her paper.
Use the blank sides of used paper to make notepads.
sentences.chinese: 利用旧纸张空白的背面，自制笔记簿或草稿纸。

sentences.english: I want to send a telegram to Canton, please. Where can I get a form?
sentences.chinese: 我想拍个电报去广州。哪里可领电报稿纸？

sentences.english: Be sure you have a paper and a sharp pencil ready.
sentences.chinese: 你要确保你备有稿纸和削好的铅笔。

definition: book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
squared paper/graph paper/grid paper (manuscript paper with squares for Chinese characters)
annotations made in a book/fig. remarks and comments/to have an opinion on everything
fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
